page.title: 07A Farmer's Wife's Life.
page.content: Mrs Barbara Harrold is a farmer's wife. If you think that being a farmer's wife is not much different from any other work, then you're wrong. Her job is very demanding and the hours she works are much longer too. Often she works from 0530 hrs to 2200hrs at such things as milking, herding, and many others. She helps her husband when someone has the day off. Mrs Harrold takes in guests for farmhouse holidays. She has many activities to distract her from the farm. She is in the Women's Institute,and sometimes does part time teachimg. She also does much flower arranging for the local church and nearby flower festivals. She is a very hard working woman.
